title: Bug 41347CCombo fires defaultSelection on mouse list selection
description: Bug 41347CCombo shouldn't fire defaultSelection on mouse list selection. A typical user of a combobox would be very surprised to have the dialog be dismissed just because the entry was selected.
OB: The CCombo fires defaultSelection when an entry is selected using the mouse in the combo list.
EB: The CCombo should not fire defaultSelection when an entry is selected using the mouse in the combo list.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Drop down the CCombo list using the mouse. 
2. Select an entry using the mouse. 
3. Notice that the CCombo fires a defaultSelection event. This behavior is not expected.
